text: "Even the Losers" is a 1980 song by Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers and is the third track from their third studio album Damn the Torpedoes. It also appeared on their 1993 album Greatest Hits. The song was not released as a single except in Australia. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers songs Category:Ryan Adams songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Even the Losers
